duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute plans for new and enhanced generation projects, managing resource allocation, schedules, cost, and technical adequacy.
Coordinate key functions such as financial feasibility analyses, engineering/design, project legal review, permitting activities, and financial negotiations.
Manage multiple and complex projects, ensuring compliance with applicable technical and regulatory requirements.
Conduct due diligence activities with internal groups and act as a liaison between internal and external specialists for project development.
Construct contractual arrangements for project development and negotiate agreements with consultants and subcontractors.
Foster external relationships with customers, third parties, and members of the community.
